item.title: EXKLUSIV Longevity: Die Longevity-Revolution
item.author: Cash.Online
item.description: Immer mehr Menschen, die auch die 100-Jahre-Grenze überschreiten, haben die Chance, ihre Ururenkel tatsächlich noch zu erleben. item.title: Euro Rally Is Latest Risk to ECB’s Inflation Outlook
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The surge in the euro is set to loom large over the European Central Bank’s first policy meeting of the year. item.title: BlackRock, Pimco See Inflation Risks the Wider Market Dismisses
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Money managers at BlackRock Inc., Bridgewater Associates and Pacific Investment Management Co. are shoring up their portfolios against a fresh bout of inflation. A BlackRock fund is building short positions in US Treasuries and gilts in case lower interest rates fail to materialize. ...
